name: Glewlwyd Gafaelwar

attributes.attribute: watchman at the gates of king Arthur’s court at Camelot

sources: Monaghan, Patricia. The Encyclopedia of Celtic Mythology and Folklore. Checkmark Books, 2008.
text: A Welsh hero by the name of Glewlwyd Gafaelwar was incorporated into Arthurian legend as the sentinel stationed at the entryway of King Arthur's court in Camelot. Glewlwyd was not only a brave fighter but also a protector of the land of Wales.
